review:
First look of phone is jst grt.The look is decent and attractive.Camera
quality is gud.Touch is gud.U cant expect a better phone than this at this
price.

The phone looks very good, it's super-light , doesn't feel like holding a
phone, the UI is good, performs fast, very good viewing angle and good
clarity, the speakers r good, the camera is okayish,but for 7k it's far
better. Battery lasts for a day easily. No problem with the phone as such,
very happy with my purchase. The 2 sim spot and 3rd memory card is a good
thing, and 5.5 inches is a game changer, it cannot get better than this. I
chose this phone over Redmi 4 as it has Gorilla glass, 3 slots and 5.5 inches
the only thing this phone doesn't have is a fingerprint sensor, rest it's a
complete package.

Phone is good for basic use. Processor is slow. Major drawback is that reboots
on its own while you are having phonecall. It just disconnects and restarts.
It's very irritating

Battery is somehow weak otherwise okk.....  
If u can wait for redmi 4 then wait for that...  
I have redmi 4 , redmi note 4& this one , and I think the best among all these
r redmi 4(value for money).......👍👍👍👍

Overall nice product but one Star reduced because sometimes screen does not
wakes up on double tapping even after enabling option of waking up screen on
double tap.

Center of MI they refused to give Job Sheet which is requested by Amazon
customer service for replacement a it is fall under 10 days replacement...
This is the worst experience of my life with Amazon and Mi phones specially. I
would recommend not to buy any MI phones from Amazon. Please please do not buy
MI phones at all.... Such a poor service they had.

Redmi Y1 Lite is good in functionality and affordability. It has a 5.5-inch
large display and a HD resolution of 720 x 1280 pixels. The device is powered
with a quad-core Snapdragon 425 processor, 1.4 GHz, with 2 GB of RAM. It runs
on Android v7.1.1 (Nougat) operating system.

It is a good phone. But if you want to buy redmi y1 is good option for you
because it is good memory and ram option 32gb and 3gb ram. Compare to y1 lite.
Overall performance is good and camera quality is also good.

Xiaomi always a most reliable smartphone company. Redmi y1 is the most
affordable with 16mp selfi. Its performance is very awesome and never lag or
hanged. Very good ram Management and super easy software experience. Miui9 is
lighting fast. Battery lasts for one day with normal usage. Under 10k this is
all in all very awesome smartphone with full of features. Im very happy to
have it. Thank you xiaomi and Amazon.
